items.content_html: The TypeScript Simple ATM Simulator is a lightweight console-based application developed to provide basic banking functionalities. Users can interact with the system to perform essential operations such as withdrawing cash, fast cash, and checking their account balances.

Users can interact with the system to perform essential operations such as withdrawing cash, fast cash, and checking their account balances.
